segments.text: I see the girl standing near the boy, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, and she looks so hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's the boy's sister or just a friend.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be cooperating with the boy to get the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad because she might not get any cookies if the boy falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is quite surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and notices what's happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is being very patient waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit frustrating to see the water going to waste like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will try to climb up herself if the boy doesn't succeed.
segments.speaker: PAR
